properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v1 v3 v1 v4 v1 v5 v1

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Asante twakushukuru, Asante kwa wema wako, Asante twakushukuru Bwana Yesu asante.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: 1. Umenilisha mwili na damu toka Mbinguni. Asante twakushukuru Bwana Yesu asante.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: 2. Na mema yako tumepata toka Mbinguni. Asante twakushukuru Bwana Yesu Asante.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: 3. Kwa mwili wako tumeshibishwa ee Bwana. Asante twakushukuru Bwana Yesu asante.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: 4. Kwa damu yako tumeburudika ee Bwana. Asante twakushukuru Bwana Yesu asante.
